definition: drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]

sentences.english: The big plaster-walled living room held six framed photographs.
sentences.chinese: 客廳的板牆上掛着六個相框。

sentences.english: A Christmas tree was placed in the comer of the brilliant hall. How beautiful it was!
sentences.chinese: 聖誕樹放在燈火通明的客廳的一角，實在是太莢了。

sentences.english: Interior is very attractive, living room with arched roof, leaded glass windows.
sentences.chinese: 內部非常誘人，客廳有拱形屋頂，鉛玻璃窗戶。

sentences.english: Before bed, standing in the wood-rich hall of the Russian Hill house, she counted her cash.
sentences.chinese: 睡覺前，她站在俄羅斯風格房子的木客廳，算錢。

sentences.english: The living room was dark, except for some light flickering out of the muted television set.
sentences.chinese: 客廳很黑，只有沒聲音的電視機在忽閃忽閃地發着光。

sentences.english: The marquis took his arm, and they left the salon.
sentences.chinese: 侯爵挽起了他的手臂，同他一起走出客廳。

sentences.english: You may want to change the furniture placement in your living room or paint the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 你也許會想更換客廳裏傢俱的位置或者臥室裏的掛畫。

sentences.english: Straw patchwork with Chinese word "Tea". Hang it on the wall of livingroom to show artistic culture.
sentences.chinese: 麥稈畫茶，適合掛在客廳，顯示主人的藝術。

sentences.english: Husband thinks pisciculture early, took aquarium place in the sitting room then.
sentences.chinese: 老公早就想養魚，於是在客廳留了魚缸位置。

sentences.english: A small dining room can be separated from the living room with a simple design.
sentences.chinese: 經過簡單的設計就能在客廳裏隔出一個小小的餐室。

sentences.english: Common areas include a large living and dining room and a library with walls custom-painted to look like wood paneling.
sentences.chinese: 公共區域包括一間大客廳兼餐廳，以及一間書房。

sentences.english: Theme living room wall calligraphy wall picture molding with a burglary of each person.
sentences.chinese: 客廳主題牆上的墨寶掛畫陶冶着每一位入室者。

sentences.english: Your selection of living room furniture is quite discriminating.
sentences.chinese: 你對客廳傢俱的選擇是很有品味的。

sentences.english: Yes, I want to buy a living room set.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我想買一套客廳傢俱。

sentences.english: It is ideal for keeping in the living room.
sentences.chinese: 客廳是其理想的安置地。

sentences.english: In the living room they saw the table covered with antiques and other ornate objects.
sentences.chinese: 在客廳他們看見了古董和其他華麗的物什。

definition: variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
to enter a door/to go in/to learn the basics of a subject/to join one's husband's household upon marriage
sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
